titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of May as "Fallen Heroes Memorial Month".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of May as "Fallen Heroes Memorial Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the veterans who gave their lives in service to the country and recognizes the families and loved ones of such veterans. Additionally, the resolution requests the President issue an annual proclamation designating May as Fallen Heroes Memorial Month.
